content:
Hi All,

Today is our scheduled release day, but I have been dealing with a horrible stomach bug all week and was fairly certain that we weren't going to end up releasing this week as planned.

I woke up today feeling great (first day all week!) so we're going to proceed with the release webinar today, and push the binaries to Maven Central at some point in the next 24 hours.

To anyone who wants to watch the webinar live, it'll be at 10:00 Eastern (NA) time but we'll be recording it as usual and a recording will be posted tomorrow. Details here: https://blog.smilecdr.com/2020/01/27/hapi-fhir-smile-cdr-koala-release-webinar/
@James Agnew Can you please share the Webinar link.
@Nagesh, I believe the Webinar link will be posted at https://blog.smilecdr.com soon.

Webinar has been posted: https://blog.smilecdr.com/2020/02/17/hapi-fhir-and-smile-cdr-feb-2020-koala-webinar/

Note that I misspoke on one point during the webinar: "Subscription Groups" was a proposed enhancement that did not get completed this past cycle. My apologies for this.
